text: Dolores Caballero Abril (9 May 1939 - 25 October 2020) was a Spanish singer and actress. She was born in Hellín, Spain. Her music was generally Copla. She starred in El emigrante (1960). From 1981 to 2004, she was married to Juanito Valderrama. Abril died on 25 October 2020 in Seville, Spain at the age of 81.Muere Dolores Abril, viuda de Juanito Valderrama, a los 81 años ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish singers Category:Spanish movie actors
title: Dolores Abril
